BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application No. 20145061 HAK submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD) for approval of Urban Development Action Area Projects and related tax exemptions for properties located at 178 Rockaway Avenue (Block 1567, Lot 31); 275 Menahan Street (Block 3309, Lot 32); 663 Willoughby Avenue (Block 1761, Lot 70); 76 Grove Street (Block 3322, Lot 10); 717 Flushing Avenue (Block 2276, Lot 3); 160 Glenmore Avenue (Block 3709, Lot 115); and 877 Dumont Avenue (Block 4061, Lot 1), in the Borough of Brooklyn, Community Boards 1, 3, 4, 5, and 16, Council Districts 33, 34, 36, 37, 41, and 42.  This matter is subject to Council review and action at the request of HPD and pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law and Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law.
Items.MatterName: UDAAP, 178 Rockaway Ave; 275 Menahan St; 663 Willoughby Ave; 76 Grove St; 717 Flushing Ave; 160 Glenmore Ave; and 877 Dumont Ave, Brooklyn (20145061 HAK)
